title: Osana Mama
description:
This volume contains 11 stories:

1-2. [i]Immature Mama[/i] 1 & 2. His mother looks so young and she dotes on her son. But when she gets drunk... (It continues in mouto de Ii no?)

3-4. [i]Tomo 1 & 2.[/i] All right, his sister makes him cross-dress and he's a wuss. But his sister and a classmate think he's so cute...

5. [i]Kuchu-Kuchu Extras.[/i]  A simple and erotic plan to beat the heat.

5-7 [i]Incontinence 1 & 2.[/i] Tomotaka wants his sister so badly he'll do anything--including drugging her and tying her up... 

8. [i]Graduation.[/i] In a grim tale of revenge and rape, Sugimoto is humilated by the boy she tormented for 3 years.

9. [i]Honeymoon In The Bed.[/i] Mutsumi and her brother are attracted to each other. They agree to sleep together in the nude...

10. [i]Honeymoon In The Room.[/i] Mitsumi and her brother happily explore their love for each other. When their mother goes shopping, Mitsumi surprises her brother by wearing bloomers.

11. [i]Honeymoon In The House.[/i] Mitsumi and her brother are thrilled when their mother is gone for the weekend. They're alone together at last...
